prompt: Edit the uploaded photo. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — facial structure, proportions, eyes, nose, lips unchanged. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original — no modification. SKIN: Retain natural texture with visible pores, remove only minor blemishes. Add soft natural freckles. Hydrated glow, beautiful catchlight on iris. HAIR: Thicken slightly, add white leather bows woven naturally into hair. Bows must look realistic with proper fabric texture. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, no filters. Sharp focus, natural skin detail. Original photo dimensions.
